# SmallSuggestions – Free Online Data Conversion Tools

SmallSuggestions is a free, browser-based platform offering utility tools for **JSON, XML, CSV, and Excel** data conversion.  
All processing happens in your browser — **no signup, no uploads, no tracking**.

## What You Can Do
- Convert files between JSON, XML, CSV, and Excel formats.
- Export to PDF, SQL, TXT, HTML, and other formats.
- Preview, edit, and validate structured data instantly.
- Handle both small and large datasets efficiently.

## Key Benefits
- **Free & Secure:** Files never leave your device.
- **Fast & Accurate:** Lightweight tools optimized for modern browsers.
- **Developer-Friendly:** Ideal for developers, analysts, and students.
- **Accessible Design:** Responsive, readable, and high-performance interface.
- **Privacy-Focused:** Local processing, zero server storage.

## Tool Categories

### JSON Tools
- [JSON → CSV](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-to-csv)
- [JSON → Excel](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-to-excel)
- [JSON → PDF](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-to-pdf)
- [JSON → SQL](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-to-sql)
- [JSON → TXT](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-to-txt)
- [JSON → HTML](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-to-html)
- [JSON → XML](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-to-xml)
- [JSON → Dart](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-to-dart)
- [JSON String → JSON Object](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-string-to-json-object)
- [JSON → JSON Schema](https://smallsuggestions.com/json-to-json-schema)

### Excel Tools
- [XLSX/XLS → CSV](https://smallsuggestions.com/convert-xlsx-to-csv)
- [XLSX/XLS → XML](https://smallsuggestions.com/convert-xlsx-to-xml)
- [Excel → HTML](https://smallsuggestions.com/excel-to-html)
- [Excel → JSON](https://smallsuggestions.com/excel-to-json)
- [XLSX/XLS → PDF](https://smallsuggestions.com/xlsx-to-pdf)
- [XLSX/XLS → SQL](https://smallsuggestions.com/xlsx-to-sql-converter)

### CSV Tools
- [CSV → JSON](https://smallsuggestions.com/convert-csv-to-json)
- [CSV → Excel](https://smallsuggestions.com/convert-csv-to-excel)
- [CSV → SQL](https://smallsuggestions.com/csv-to-sql)
- [CSV → PDF](https://smallsuggestions.com/convert-csv-to-pdf)
- [CSV → XML](https://smallsuggestions.com/convert-csv-to-xml)
- [CSV → TXT](https://smallsuggestions.com/convert-csv-to-txt)


## Why SmallSuggestions
Small, reliable, and continuously expanding tools that simplify everyday data tasks.  
Designed for professional and personal use — perfect for anyone who works with structured data.

**Primary Category:** Online Data Conversion Tools  
**Main Focus Areas:** JSON Tools, XML Tools, CSV Tools, Excel Tools  
**Website:** [https://smallsuggestions.com](https://smallsuggestions.com)  
**Type:** Free Web Utility Platform
